heading: Join us
text: Are you interested in back-end, front-end, have a sense for design, or perhaps want to test your skills in management and organization? Join us, in each of these roles you'll be able to realize yourself in AKAI.

jobs.name: Front-end development
jobs.desc: Everything the user sees. Responsible for the appearance and behavior of a website or web application. It is created with the help of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, but nowadays, that's often not enough. That's why we often use various frameworks like React, Vue, Next.js, and Gatsby.

jobs.name: Back-end development
jobs.desc: Software that runs on the server side. It processes data and performs various operations. This is where the magic happens. In the circle, we use different programming languages (e.g., Python, Java, PHP, Go, Ruby).

jobs.name: Mobile development
jobs.desc: The world of mobile applications, available at your fingertips, on iOS and Android devices. We typically write apps natively for Android in Kotlin or multiplatform using Flutter. In the mobile section, we also sometimes create PWAs.

jobs.name: Graphic design / UI / UX
jobs.desc: Before we create something, it's worth designing it. In addition to making it visually appealing, it's also important to ensure that the interface is intuitive for the user.
